IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PORTSMOUTH CHRISTIAN ACADEMY EXISTS TO HONOR GOD JOYFULLY BY INSPIRING STUDENTS TO MAXIMIZE THEIR GOD-GIVEN POTENTIAL.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PORTSMOUTH CHRISTIAN ACADEMY EXISTS TO HONOR GOD JOYFULLY BY INSPIRING STUDENTS TO MAXIMIZE THEIR GOD-GIVEN POTENTIAL.
IRS990.Desc: THE MISSION OF PORTSMOUTH CHRISTIAN ACADEMY (PCA) IS TO HONOR GOD JOYFULLY BY INSPIRING STUDENTS TO MAXIMIZE THEIR GOD-GIVEN POTENTIAL. PCA IS A PRE-K THROUGH GRADE 12 DAY SCHOOL THAT EDUCATES AND INSPIRES OVER 660 STUDENTS FROM FAMILIES WHO HAIL FROM THREE STATES AND SEVERAL COUNTRIES. PCA IS THE LARGEST PRIVATE INDEPENDENT CHRISTIAN SCHOOL IN NEW ENGLAND. PCA'S PROGRAM BRINGS ACADEMIC RIGOR, SOUND ETHICS, AND SPIRITUAL DEVELOPMENT TOGETHER TO ESTABLISH YOUNG MEN AND WOMEN OF CHARACTER AND COMMITMENT TO LEADERSHIP AND SERVICE IN THE NEXT STEP OF THEIR EMERGING CALLINGS: AT THEIR COLLEGE, IN THEIR COMMUNITIES, AND IN THEIR CHURCHES. OUR PHILOSOPHY OF EDUCATION IS BASED ON THE CLASSICAL TRIVIUM, EQUIPPING STUDENTS IN DEVELOPMENTALLY APPROPRIATE WAYS FOR LIFELONG LEARNING. WE DO THIS THROUGH A CHRIST-CENTERED CURRICULUM THAT REVEALS THE SPECIFIC AND GENERAL REVELATION OF GOD. THIS YEAR, PCA HAS AGAIN BEEN RECOGNIZED BY NICHE.COM AS THE BEST PRIVATE K-12 SCHOOL IN NEW HAMPSHIRE FOR SIX YEARS IN A ROW. WITH OVER 40 YEARS AS A SCHOOL, PCA REMAINS COMMITTED TO ITS VISION OF DEVELOPING CHRIST-CENTERED GRADUATES-NOW OVER 1100--WHO IMPACT THE WORLD FOR GOOD. UNDERGIRDING OUR VISION ARE PCA'S CORE VALUES OF CHRIST-CENTEREDNESS, EXCELLENCE, BIBLICAL INTEGRITY, COMPASSIONATE COMMUNITY, CURIOSITY, HUMILITY, AND JOY. OUR PROGRAMS ARE PROVEN, AS PCA IS ACCREDITED BY BOTH THE ASSOCIATION OF CHRISTIAN SCHOOLS INTERNATIONAL (ACSI) AND THE NEW ENGLAND ASSOCIATION OF SCHOOLS AND COLLEGES (NEASC). OUR STAFF PURSUES EXCELLENCE THEMSELVES, AS 55% OF PCA'S FACULTY HOLD ADVANCED DEGREES. OUR LOCATION SUPPORTS OUR CALL TO STEWARD GOD'S CREATION, AS WE ARE SITUATED ON OVER 50 ACRES ALONG THE BELLAMY RIVER IN DOVER. OUR PROGRAMS ARE BROAD AND WIDE-RANGING, INCLUDING WELL-PLANNED AND RESOURCED CLASSROOMS, WATERFRONT LEARNING LABS, AS WELL AS RICH AND LIVELY VISUAL AND PERFORMING ARTS. PCA STUDENTS MAY PARTICIPATE ON ONE OR MORE OF OUR 25 ATHLETIC TEAMS AND MORE THAN 30 CLUBS AND EXTRACURRICULAR OFFERINGS. AS AN ACADEMY, PCA DEVELOPS ITS STUDENTS IN MIND, BODY, AND SPIRIT. IT IS WELL-POISED TO CONTINUE PREPARING ITS NEXT 1000 GRADUATES TO LIVE CHRIST-CENTERED LIVES AND GO OUT AND IMPACT GOD'S WORLD FOR GOOD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE INTENDED USE OF THE ENDOWMENT IS TO SUPPORT FUTURE SCHOLARSHIPS.

FIN 48 FOOTNOTE - THE ACADEMY IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. THE ACADEMY IS CLASSIFIED AS OTHER THAN A PRIVATE FOUNDATION. THE FEDERAL AND STATE OF NEW HAMPSHIRE TAX RETURNS OF THE ACADEMY ARE SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION, GENERALLY FOR THREE YEARS AFTER THEY WERE FILED.
DIRECT FUNDRAISING EXPENSES REPORTED ON PART VIII LINE 8B: -51,810.
DIRECT FUNDRAISING EXPENSES REPORTED ON PART VIII LINE 8B: -51,810. INVESTMENT FEES 2,197.
THE ORGANIZATION PUBLICIZES ITS RACIALLY NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY IN PRINT, BROADCAST, AND INTERNET MEDIA. THE POLICY IS ALSO INCLUDED IN ITS APPLICATION FOR ENROLLMENT.

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.TransactionDesc: ARMS LENGTH TRANSACTION FOR THE RENTAL OF FACILITY FOR TRAINING

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE HEAD OF SCHOOL WILL REVIEW THE MANAGEMENT LETTER. CLM WILL FORWARD THE DRAFT FORM 990 TO THE BOARD MEMBERSHIP FOR REVIEW.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS A REPORTING PROCESS THAT REQUIRES DISCLOSURE FROM THE CONFLICT'S INCEPTION AND ANNUAL COMPLETION OF A DISCLOSURE FORM. THE REST OF THE BOARD IS MADE AWARE OF ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICTS AND IS REQUIRED TO VOTE ON THEIR MATERIALITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ORIGINAL COMPENSATION PARAMETERS WERE BASED ON A REVIEW OF COMPARABLE DATA AVAILABLE THROUGH ACSI AND OTHER CHRISTIAN SCHOOL RESOURCES .

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
FINANCE COMMITTEE ACTS AS AUDIT COMMITTEE
